column4: I tried using Pidgin to get on this channel and ended up having to go to Chatzilla. How do I get on using Pidgin eventhough I do not have a Username nor password for freenode and IRC
You don't need a password - and the "username" you need is actually the nickname.
Configure it like this: Protocol ICQ, username "vaughn", server "chat.freenode.net", no password.
